name: Aircraft Sketch Shooter
description:
Aircraft Sketch Shooter


A Arcade Action Shooter, you can Pick between various Aircrafts to Play with.



Gameplay



Different Aircrafts to Play
You can Choose between 3 Starting Aircrafts.

Unique Boss Fights and Level
Encounter 10 Unique Levels and fight the Boss of Each Level

Challenges
Test your Pilot Skills in various Challenges.

Endless Level
In an Endless Generated Level, with uncountable Wave Design, you can go for the Highest Scores in the Game.

Variation



Design
There are more then 40 Unique Handrawn Realistic Aircrafts, Helicopters, Gunships and Prototypes with different Settings and Behaviours.

Power Ups
Boost your Aircraft Weapon System with Power Ups, Increase your Vision and Speed Up your Aircraft

Power Downs
Those Power Downs make your Aircraft weaker. But they might Increase your Score!

Difficulty Adjustment
The Game is to easy? Make it Harder! Give your Enemies Double Life or Increase the Spawn Rate!

Graphic Style
The Game offers the Player to change the Graphic Style in different Colors and from Light to Dark Mode. There is for every Eye the right Style!

Highscore


Online
You can Save your Statistics, Flights and Challenges Online and participate on Daily, Weekly, Monthly and General Highscore Lists and Leaderboards

Local
Your Statistics gets Saved Local aswell, so Internet Connection is not required.



Aircraft Sketch Shooter is an Ink Style Arcade Game. All Graphics are Handdrawn.
